title: Can I do K-pop music without K-pop companies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Can I do K-pop music without K-pop companies? Yes, there are independent artists and groups in the industry. This is “Destiny”:  It's not completely unlike some of the very small one-person entertainment companies. Rich World Entertainment's “High School”:  In the case of Destiny, you have KPop veterans, who have trained with some of the big companies, debuted two or three times, and can navigate their way through the system on their own. They range in age from 28 to 31. Working on your own means doing everything yourself, and hiring out the rest. Production, songwriting, choreo, etc… …not really any different than any other music genre.
